name: Glitchzilla, Nexus Devourer
description: A colossal entity born from a cascade of critical system errors, Glitchzilla consumes raw data to fuel its chaotic existence, threatening to unravel entire zones of the Quantum Nexus.
lore: Legends say Glitchzilla was once a core maintenance program, twisted by an unknown anomaly into a being of pure digital destruction.

abilities.name: Data Slam
abilities.description: Slams the area with corrupted data, dealing AoE damage.

abilities.name: Corruption Aura
abilities.description: Continuously damages nearby entities and reduces their Firewall.

abilities.name: Nexus Pulse
abilities.description: Unleashes a powerful pulse that disrupts entity functions, potentially silencing skills.

newAbilities.name: Fragmented Spawn
newAbilities.description: Summons smaller Data Anomalies to attack.

spawnConditions: Triggers during a 'Critical System Meltdown' world event.
